Like the little girl beside him, Souji found the hems of their skirts starting to rise. "I'm going this way. See you at home!" Nanako joined some other little girls that clearly had a lot to eat this morning. After walking away, her cousin had a strange idea come into his head. Could the person in the fog be fattening up these girls? And what if they're trying to make it part of something nefarious? "Oww..." Souji wondered whether or not to help the boy up, though he smiled up at the silver-haired youth. "Don't worry about me. I've been in worse crashes!" He got up slowly and walked even slower: it looked like he hurt his groin. "I'm fine, just got to, ouch, walk it off."

Meanwhile in Classroom 2-2:

A few boys had been lamenting their luck. They learned their homeroom teacher would be none other than Morooka Kinshiro, or Morokin as he was well known amongst the students. Bad-tempered, quick to judge, boring as hell. The perfect package of suckiness. And Souji was about to find this out firsthand.

"Hey you, shiny!" Souji pointed at himself, confused at the buck-toothed man's shouting. "Yeah, you! Ya see any other silver haired punks around here?" The boy rolled his eyes, annoyed that this guy was giving him attitude without even knowing who he was. "You Seta Souji? I was told to look for your hair. You're in my homeroom, so listen up. Just write your name on the board and keep your trap shut when I bring you in." As the teacher turned around, he looked back. "Oh yeah, and keep your eyes off the girls here. I know guys like you get that way, especially considering how they're blowing up right now."

At that moment, the boy Souji found by the trash walked up to the door.

"Hey, sorry, I-"

"Really? Late already?" Morooka glared at the brown-haired boy. "At least your hair's dyed a natural color. Get in there and shut up."

"Yes, sir." Under his breath, however, "Douchebag."

"Listen up!" Morooka entered after him with Souji in tow. "I'm Morooka Kinshiro, your homeroom teacher for the next year. As long as you're in my class, you listen to me. I don't want any of you slacking off, getting any ideas about any romantic nonsense and if you're a girl-" He stopped to stare at a rotund blond haired girl in a green jacket that was ill equipped to cover her belly button. "Stop eating, I'm sure you've already had enough as is." The girl had opened her jowly mouth to eat a burger and pouted when ordered to stop. "Now there's a new student joining us. Hopefully, he won't be a disrespectful asshole to the girls here. Not that they'd have any interest in you."

"You'd be the perfect person to teach me about that, sir." The whole class went silent as a vein popped up on Morokin's head.

"I thought I told you to keep your trap shut! Who do you think you are talking to me that way?" Just then, Morooka caught a glimpse of something terrifying. Souji had a vicious look on his face in the teacher's eyes, one that crackled with electricity.

"Someone who doesn't take crap from other people when I don't deserve it," the boy said. The rest of the class just saw a defiant and extremely cool-headed student, but to Morokin, Souji's visage grew more horrible, like it wasn't even human anymore.

"S-s-stay back!" Morooka struck back in fear. Souji now wore a white mask, leaving only his eyes that turned gold and deadly. "Please, don't hurt me!" The teacher ran screaming out of the room, leaving his students confused but somewhat happy.

Later on...

Morooka had to take a leave of absence. His hallucinations didn't have an explanation yet, but he refused to teach in his current state. Souji's appearance seemed to break him.

"So what exactly did you do?" The brown haired boy was enamored with Souji's "handling" of Morooka. He introduced himself as Hanamura Yosuke, another recent transfer from a big city. His father ran the local Junes and he helped run the store. Souji had no idea what happened, so he had no answer.

"It was still pretty cool." The green jacketed girl bounced excitedly on her chubby heels, letting her bowl cut and stomach flow. "Name's Satonaka Chie." Ironically enough, Souji had several girls' attention, all of whom threatened to crush him if they got to crowding around him to closely. Thankfully, they seemed to know their limits and kept their distance, except for Chie who looked to be the biggest of all of them. Her belly squished on Souji's desk. "What do you think, Yukiko?" Chie turned her head to a girl in a too small red shirt, brushing back her long. black hair.

"It was certainly interesting," Yukiko said. She was just smaller than Chie, but from Souji's point of view, this didn't mean much. She kept her face to the side, letting the admired boy see her two chins in profile. He estimated that the two largest girls weighed around 160 kg each. "Hey, Chie, shouldn't we head up to the roof? It's just about time for lunch."

"Right! Gotta put some fuel in the tank!" Chie slapped her drum of a belly. "Hey, you want to join us?" She gave an expectant look towards Souji, who agreed. "Awesome! Hanamura, you're coming too! You've still got a DVD to return, you know." Chie and Yukiko lumbered away to the door. Souji caught glimpses of both their underwear as their blubbery butts flipped their skirts. Lime green for Chie, similar to her jacket, white for Yukiko. What's more, Yukiko's stockings had a rather odd look about them, almost like they used to be whole.
